export const getProducts=()=>async dispatch=>{try{const data=await fetch("/getproducts",{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});const res=await data.json();// console.log(res);
dispatch({type:"SUCCESS_GET_PRODUCTS",payload:res});}catch(error){dispatch({type:"FAIL_GET_PRODUCTS",payload:error.response});}};
